repair.repairedDockerfile:
FROM golang:alpine3.13 as build

RUN apk add --no-cache gcc libc-dev

WORKDIR /build

COPY . .

RUN go build -ldflags="-s -w"

FROM alpine:3.13

WORKDIR /pacoloco

COPY --from=build /build/pacoloco .

EXPOSE 9129

CMD ["/pacoloco/pacoloco"]
